name: Amtu-orders
tagline: Scripts and documents for using Amazon's AMTU utilitity to download and process Orders
body:
# AMTU Orders
## Simple script and documentation for fetching ORDERS data from Amazon via AMTU

Really simple script for fetching ORDERS data from Amazon via AMTU, catching the files with a VBScript and loading the data into a flat table in SQL Server using bcp.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
